triangle



Triangle2f

typedef vec2f Triangle2f[3];
type: C typedef
description: 2d triangle float

Triangle2d

typedef vec2d Triangle2d[3];
type: C typedef
description: 2d triangle double

Trianglef

typedef vec3f Trianglef[3];
type: C typedef
description: 3d triangle float

Triangled

typedef vec3d Triangled[3];
type: C typedef
description: 3d triangle double

m_triangle2_setd

type: C function
description: set triangle 2d - double

type: C function
description: test if triangle 2d contains point (vec2)

void m_triangle2_centroidd(Triangle2d triangle, vec2d res);
type: C function
description: return centroid (vec2) of triangle 2d

type: C function
description: get normal (vec3) from triangle
